set (JEMALLOC_ARCHIVE "${JEMALLOC_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/lib/libjemalloc.a")

add_custom_command (
	OUTPUT				${JEMALLOC_ARCHIVE}
	COMMAND				sh
	ARGS				"${JEMALLOC_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/makeHook.sh"
	WORKING_DIRECTORY	${JEMALLOC_BUILTIN_LOCATION}
	COMMENT				"Building jemalloc..."
)

message (STATUS "configuring 3rd party library: jemalloc ...")
execute_process (
	COMMAND				sh ${JEMALLOC_BUILTIN_LOCATION}/configureHook.sh
	WORKING_DIRECTORY	${JEMALLOC_BUILTIN_LOCATION}
)
